about.title: About
about.about1: INSEMASA is a company that aims to be socially and economically responsible.
about.about2: We specialize in sourcing and exporting quality sesame and peanut seeds
about.about3: exceptional small farms and cooperatives in Nicaragua. Our main goal is to provide our
about.about4: customers/partners to produce top-notch products and at the same time, support local farmers
about.mision: To export sustainable premium raw materials and manufactured products. Meeting the need of our customers and collaborating with local farmers to improve techniques and productivity.
about.vision: To become a leading player in Nicaragua's peanut and sesame industries, focused on quality, sustainability, innovation and social responsibility.

cta.title: We will support you in your next step

news.title: News
news.desc: At INSEMASA, we believe in a future where agriculture not only nourishes, but also protects our planet.
news.n2: Producers ploughing horses for weed control.
news.d2: Our dedicated and passionate sesame producers in the El Tololar Nicaragua community are at the heart of our mission. Together, we practice sustainable agriculture that respects and cares for the earth.
news.n3: The result: Sesame of the highest quality.
news.d3: Each sesame seed tells a story of sustainability, effort and dedication, grown responsibly, reaching markets around the world.
news.n4: From our lands to your table.
news.d4: By choosing our products, you not only get superior quality, but you also support local communities and contribute to a safer and more sustainable global food system.
news.d5: This year, INSEMASA producers are harvesting high-quality, nutrient-rich sesame. Ideal for local consumption and export, this product stands out for its purity, flavor and nutritional benefits.
news.d6: Sustainably grown Nicaraguan sesame is gaining popularity in international markets. Its high demand is driving exports and benefiting small producers.
news.d7: INSEMASA guarantees the superior quality of its sesame, complying with international standards in harvesting, storage and transport. An example of sustainable agriculture and teamwork.
news.n8: A coffee that is born at high altitude.
news.d8: The Mancotal region of Jinotega is one of Nicaragua's most consistent coffee-growing territories. Its cool microclimates and fertile soils allow for coffees with clean, sweet, and balanced aromatic profiles.

galery.title: Gallery
galery.desc: Our operations revolve around prioritizing smallholder farmers and understanding their unique needs and expectations.
